How to run code:

There are SIX categories- (CLICK ON Outline TO VIEW IT)

* Data Input and pre-processing

* Condition A

* Condition B

* Condition C

* Condition D

* Condition E

!!! FIRST RUN Data Input and pre-processing BY HIGHLIGHTING THE CODE COMPLETELY !!!

THEN, HIGHLIGHT THE REQUIRED CONDITION COMPLETELY TO RUN THE CODE.

BUT NOTE: !!! FIRST RUN Data Input and pre-processing BY HIGHLIGHTING THE CODE COMPLETELY !!!

YOU CAN HIGHLIGHT SUB SECTIONS OF CONDITIONS TO RUN A SPECIFIC PLOT AS WELL.

TO RUN FULLY:  

1. ctrl + A 

2. ctrl + Enter OR CLICK ON RUN BUTTON
